name: Battle Buggy Grounds

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Battle Buggy Grounds/Battle Buggy Groundz.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Groupees installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Battle Buggy Grounds/Battle Buggy Groundz.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: '"/S" "/D="C:\\Program Files\\Battle Buggy Grounds""'
    executable: $file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
